sense.def:
To search for something
pomeni nekaj natančno iskati.
To search a place
pomeni, da prostor ali območje natančno pregledamo, da bi nekaj našli.

seg.quote: He glanced around the room, searching for a place to sit.
He searched through a drawer and eventually found the photo.
I searched the city for a room.

sense.def:
Kadar policisti
search someone
, pregledajo človekova oblačila, da bi našli morebitne skrite predmete.

seg.quote: We were stopped by the police and searched.

sense.def:
A search
je poskus, da bi nekaj našli s skrbnim pregledovanjem.

seg.quote: I found the keys after a long search.

sense.def:
Kadar gre nekdo
in search of something
, se loti iskanja tiste stvari.

seg.quote: We went round the town in search of a place to stay.
